bots.description: The botlist with built-in GitHub integration

servers.description: The server list with built-in GitHub integration

reviews.add: Add your own bot or server
reviews.description: A curated list of the best bots

locale.pleasehelp: Are you a good translator? Click here.

edit.title: Add a application
edit.info: Fields marked with (OPTIONAL) are optional. Do not type anything in boxes which are optional if you do not have them. Optional means optional, and does not mean type 'N/A' or 'none'. Pull requests with this will be rejected.
edit.notice: When you are finished, click the "Create a pull request" button to publish to GitHub.
edit.default:
<!--
This is the description box.
The contents of this box will appear on your bot page

This box supports:
- Markdown
- HTML

Please refrain from using CSS.
CSS may be deprecated in the future and removed.
-->

steps.service: Please select a type of service

server_id.title: Server ID
server_id.placeholder: The ID of the server. Something like: 330777295952543744

bot_avatar.title: Avatar URL
bot_avatar.placeholder: Any direct link to the bot image

server_avatar.title: Avatar URL
server_avatar.placeholder: Any direct link to the server image

bot_cover.title: Cover Image
bot_cover.placeholder: http:// or https:// - Image on homepage and in header of your page

bot_support.title: Support URL
bot_support.small: Leave this field empty if you don't like helping people

bot_images.title: Images
bot_images.placeholder: http:// or https:// - A link to an image demonstrating your bot

bot_nsfw.title: NSFW
bot_nsfw.false: NSFW commands are not a major part of this bot
bot_nsfw.true: The bot avatar is NSFW, and/or the bot is NSFW orientated

server_nsfw.title: NSFW
server_nsfw.false: This is not a NSFW server

bot_description.title: Description
bot_description.placeholder: This bot allows you to do magic.
bot_description.small: The front page only allows 60 characters to be displayed.

server_description.title: Description
server_description.placeholder: This server is magical and gives you powers beyond comprehension

modal.title: Create a pull request
modal.description: Please enter any comments you would like to make

localstorage.title: localStorage was not found
localstorage.description: localStorage is required for this service to function.
